description:
考研初试在即，沪江考研教研老师特地为大家精心准备了考研英语考前必背的资料，供大家参考背诵，抓住最后的时间，胸有成竹踏上考场。

一、应用文写作

Directions:

You learned that Ms. Wang was helping you dealing with office matters during your sick leave. Write a letter of appreciation to her to express your thanks. Your letter should include:

1) what you heard of what Wang did,

2) the reason for your thanks,

3) the favor you'd like to offer.

You should write about 100 words on the ANSWER SHEET.

Do not use your own name. Use "Li Ming" instead.

Do not write your address. (10 points)

模版范文

Dear Ms. Wang,

I'm told by Zhang Lei that you were the good-hearted man who kept my desk from overflowing during my sick leave while still keeping up your own work!

I had been expecting the chaos once I returned to my office, but instead I was able to start back with a clear desk. I am most appreciative of everything you did for me. I don't know if this is a compliment or not, but you did things just as I would have done!

Do call on me if I can ever return the favor.

Yours truly,

Li Ming

 

Directions:

Jane, your classmate, is thinking of subscribing to an English-language newspaper. And you would like to recommend one to her. Write a letter to

1) tell her which newspaper it is and

2) describe two features of the paper.

You should write about 100 words on ANSWER SHEET.

Do not use your own name.Use "Li Ming" instead.

Do not write the address. (10 points)

模版范文

Dear Jane,

As to the English-language newspaper you are thinking of subscribing to, I would recommend 21st Century.

First, I think that the contents of the newspaper are interesting and entertaining enough for you to carry on reading, for they consist mainly of buzz, opinion, focus, culture, campus, career and hotshots. In addition, the language of its articles is not too difficult for you to understand, as its targeted audience is largely college students, non-English majors in particular.

I believe it will be more beneficial if you can read the newspaper every day, and your English will definitely be improved. Wish you good luck!

                                                         Yours sincerely,

                                                       Li Ming
